        public TrainingSample<double[]> project(TrainingSample<double[]> s)
        Project a single sample using the trained projectors.
        Parameters:
        s - the sample to project
        Returns:
        a new sample with the projected vector, and the same label

      • project

        public TrainingSample<double[]> project(TrainingSample<double[]> s,
                               boolean whitening)
        Project a single sample using the trained projectors with optional whitening (unitary covariance matrix).
        Parameters:
        s - the sample to project
        whitening - option to perform a whitened projection
        Returns:
        a new sample with the projected vector and the same label

        whitening - option to perform a whitened projection

        a new list with projected samples
